pricingServices.p: The best jobs at the best prices only with us, Elux Beauty Salon.

bookSection.title: Feel better & better with ELUX studio
bookSection.description: Where elegance meets expertise. Our dedicated team of professionals is here to pamper you with personalized treatments, transforming your look and enhancing your natural beauty.

subscribe.title: SUBSCRIBE
subscribe.description: Subscribe to our newsletter for expert beauty tips and salon news

footer.copyright: © COPYRIGHT 2024 EluX. Experience luxury and rejuvenation with our expert beauty treatments. Follow us on social media for the latest updates and exclusive offers.

contact.title: Contact US
contact.subtitle: Whether you have questions, feedback, or need assistance, our team is ready to support you.

aboutPagetwo.mainTitle: BEAUTY SALON ELUX OFFERS A RANGE OF SERVICES
aboutPagetwo.fullRangeTitle: FULL RANGE OF SERVICES FROM ELUX
aboutPagetwo.desc1: EluX Beauty Salon is a premier beauty destination founded on the principles of luxury, innovation, and personalized care. Our team of experienced professionals is passionate about helping you look and feel your best.
aboutPagetwo.desc2: At EluX Beauty Salon, our mission is to deliver a premium beauty experience that combines high-quality products, exceptional service, and a serene atmosphere. We are committed to creating a space where you can relax, rejuvenate, and transform your look.
aboutPagetwo.desc3: EluX Beauty Salon is a premier beauty destination founded on the principles of luxury, innovation, and personalized care. Our team of experienced professionals is passionate about helping you look and feel your best.

text.text1: Our expert stylists specialize in high-quality hair extensions and advanced hair care solutions to give you the luscious locks you've always dreamed of.
text.text2: Brides-to-be can trust our talented team to create stunning and elegant hairstyles for their special day, ensuring you look perfect as you walk down the aisle.
text.text3: We offer unique and stylish braiding services for children, making sure they leave our salon with a smile and a beautiful, age-appropriate hairstyle.
text.text4: Whether it's for a special occasion or everyday glamour, our makeup artists will enhance your natural beauty with professional techniques and high-quality products.

choose.title: Expertise
choose.text: Our team is composed of experienced professionals who are passionate about beauty and dedicated to their craft.
choose.text2: We stay updated with the latest industry trends and technologies to offer you cutting-edge services.
choose.text3: We believe in providing customized treatments that cater to your specific needs and preferences.
choose.text4: From the moment you step into our salon, you will be enveloped in an atmosphere of elegance and relaxation.
